text: Lakhanke Padde is a village in Kapurthala district of Punjab State, India. It is located from Kapurthala, which is both district and sub-district headquarters of Lakhanke Padde. The village is administrated by a Sarpanch, who is an elected representative. == Demography == According to the report published by Census India in 2011, Lakhanke Padde has 778 houses with the total population of 3,830 persons of which 2,008 are male and 1,822 females. Literacy rate of Lakhanke Padde is 72.88%, lower than the state average of 75.84%. The population of children in the age group 0–6 years is 360 which is 9.40% of the total population. Child sex ratio is approximately 989, higher than the state average of 846. == Population data == {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Particulars !! Total !!
